category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 11 (Audit of member organizations, etc.)
contents: Article 11 (Audit of member organizations, etc.) ① Deleted March 16, 2021, ② When deemed necessary, the Sports Association investigates and audits the business and accounting work of member organizations and their member organizations (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Association-related organizations). can do. Revised July 5, 2021, ③ If an organization related to the Sports Council violates the matters stipulated in the Articles of Incorporation or violates the relevant regulations regarding the financial support received from the Sports Council, the Sports Council may take action against the organization in accordance with the Articles of Incorporation and related regulations. there is. ④ If illegal or unfair facts are found to exist as a result of the investigation or audit pursuant to paragraph 2, the Sports Council may take disciplinary action against the relevant organization or relevant person or request disciplinary action or corrective action in accordance with the Sports Council's disciplinary and audit-related regulations. .
